# GroupSessionMessenger.DeliveryMode.reliable

**Case**

An attempt to ensure the delivery of messages to known participants.

## Declaration

```swift
case reliable
```

## Discussion

Use this approach to send messages that are critical to the experience you create. The [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionMessenger] enqueues a message until it is successfully transmitted to all known participants.  The system doesn’t guarantee delivery to participants who join a group session after you send a message, or who leave the group prior to delivery.

## Getting the delivery mode options

- **GroupSessionMessenger.DeliveryMode.unreliable**: A best-effort attempt to deliver the message to known participants.
